introduction: Martha is the daughter-in-law of MD Raya, her husband is the first son of MD Raya’s twelfth wife. While Adi–Martha’s husband–is studying in Malang, Martha has to work for MD Raya’s family while waiting for her husband to return home. MD Raya is waiting for Adi to return from college to raise the family’s pride, which has been lost since MD Raya ceased to be the village head.源自：https://ffd.or.id/en/film/one-big-sumba-family/
